charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Ethan
and Lugia looking out to sea...
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0200:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Did you
come to see the sea too?
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0300:
I was just thinking about its depths while
looking at the water with Lugia.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0400:
We awakened our arc suit, which is proof of
our strong bond.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0500:
I was thinking about Lugia and all we’ve
been through.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0600:
Sometimes, it still feels unreal that I’m its
partner.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0700:
I may have mentioned this before, but
Lugia’s powers are too strong, so it tries
to distance itself from people.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0800:
They say that’s why Lugia chooses to live
deep under the sea.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_0900: Did you know that about Lugia?
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1000:
In Johto, we have the Whirl Islands. They
used to all be one large island, but they
were split into four.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1100:
Two countries were fighting over
the island back then.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1200:
They say Lugia got upset and cast lightning
bolts to tear the island into four pieces.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1300:
And ever since, Lugia’s supposedly been
hiding at the bottom of the sea.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1400:
If what they say is true, why’d Lugia make
its way back to land?
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_0301_1500: To team up with you, Ethan?
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_0402_1800: Maybe! Lugia IS kind, you know!
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_1900: I suppose it doesn’t matter why.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_2000:
What’s important now is that Lugia
acknowledges me—and that I obtained an
arc suit!
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_2100:
That must mean our strong bond was
recognized!
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_2200:
I’ve gotta keep aiming higher—for Lugia and
myself!
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_0402_2800: Right? That’s what makes Lugia so cool!
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_3000:
Lugia acts cool on the outside, but it feels
the same way I do.
charaepi_ch0112_90_hibiki/2301_1201_3200: This arc suit should be proof enough!
